# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*.so

# Jupyter Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# Environment variables
.env

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# VSCode or PyCharm project settings (optional)
.vscode/
.idea/

# CSV/Generated files (optional if large or not useful in GitHub)
data/sales_data.csv
